definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
see 肉豆蔻 nutmeg, 豆蔻 cardamon

sentences.english: It is the first time that the histological characteristics of peel dissociation of the above two kinds of herbs are identified.
sentences.chinese: 本文首次提供了二種白豆蔻的果皮解離組織特徵。

definition: Amomom (fructus Amomi), plant used in Chinese medicine
Thai ginger/lesser galangale (Kaempferia galanga)/cyanide (loanword)/same as 氰化
husk of betel nut 檳榔|槟榔[bing1 lang5]
nutmeg (Myristica fragrans Houtt)/mace/Myristicaceae (family of plants producing aromatic or hallucinogenic oils)
Chinese cinnamon (Cinnamomum cassia)/also written 肉桂[rou4 gui4]
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
